name: part_009
file: tmp_【#戌神ころね生誕祭2021】久しぶりの３Ｄライブ！？今年もいっぱいおめでとうをありがとう！【戌神ころね⧸ホロライブ】 [2l3i7MulCgs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Inugami Korone performs 'Love Trial' (恋愛裁判) on a 3D stage with neon lights.
Inugami Korone performs 'Gokuraku Jodo' (極楽浄土) with a background of floating mascots and pink lights.

subtitles.original: 恋愛裁判
subtitles.english: Love Trial

subtitles.original: どこが完全犯罪？君も僕も同じだけの
subtitles.english: Where is the perfect crime? You and I, both with the same...

subtitles.original: 悲しみを
subtitles.english: ...sadness.

subtitles.original: 愛した人　愛された人
subtitles.english: The one who loved, the one who was loved

subtitles.original: 互いを裁き合う運命だから
subtitles.english: It's our destiny to judge each other

subtitles.original: 有罪判決　君は僕にどれくらいの罪を問う？
subtitles.english: Guilty verdict. How much of a crime will you charge me with?

subtitles.original: 終身刑で償う覚悟
subtitles.english: Prepared to make amends with a life sentence

subtitles.original: 死ぬまで君だけを守るよ
subtitles.english: I'll protect only you until I die

subtitles.original: 恋愛裁判　君が僕に教えてくれた真実
subtitles.english: Love Trial. The truth that you taught me

subtitles.original: 偽りの涙の後で
subtitles.english: After those false tears

subtitles.original: 密かに微笑んだ小悪魔
subtitles.english: A little devil smiled secretly

subtitles.original: 君もギルティ
subtitles.english: You're guilty too

subtitles.original:
極楽浄土
作詞：MARiA　作曲：toku
subtitles.english:
Gokuraku Jodo
Lyrics: MARiA  Composition: toku

subtitles.original: 月明かり昇る頃 灯る赤提灯
subtitles.english: When the moonlight rises, the red paper lanterns are lit

subtitles.original: 祭囃子の合図 ふわり 蝶が誘い出す
subtitles.english: The signal of the festival music, a butterfly softly invites you out

subtitles.original: ちょいと覗いて見てごらん
subtitles.english: Take a little peek and see

subtitles.original: 迷い込めば抜け出せない
subtitles.english: Once you wander in, you can't get out

subtitles.original: 楽しいことがしたいなら
subtitles.english: If you want to do something fun

subtitles.original: おいでませ 極楽浄土
subtitles.english: Come on over to the Sukhavati

subtitles.original: 歌えや歌え 心のままに
subtitles.english: Sing and sing, just as your heart desires

subtitles.original: アナタの声を聞かせて
subtitles.english: Let me hear your voice

subtitles.original: 踊れや踊れ 時を忘れ
subtitles.english: Dance and dance, forgetting about time

subtitles.original: 今宵共にああ狂い咲き
subtitles.english: Tonight, together, ah, blooming madly

subtitles.original: 美しく咲く花も いつか散りゆくもの
subtitles.english: Even the flowers that bloom beautifully will one day scatter

subtitles.original: それならこの一夜を もっと熱く愛したい
subtitles.english: In that case, I want to love this single night even more passionately

subtitles.original: ちょいと「いいこと」いたしましょう
subtitles.english: Let's do something "good"

subtitles.original: これは夢か幻か
subtitles.english: Is this a dream or an illusion?

subtitles.original: 嘘も真もない世界
subtitles.english: A world with neither lies nor truth

subtitles.original: ゆきましょう 極楽浄土
subtitles.english: Let's go to the Sukhavati

subtitles.original: 歌えや歌え 心のままに
subtitles.english: Sing and sing, just as your heart desires

subtitles.original: 乱れる髪を気にせず
subtitles.english: Without worrying about your messy hair

subtitles.original: 踊れや踊れ 時を忘れ
subtitles.english: Dance and dance, forgetting about time

subtitles.original: 今宵共にああ狂い咲き
subtitles.english: Tonight, together, ah, blooming madly

subtitles.original: ちょいと「いいこと」いたしましょう
subtitles.english: Let's do something "good"

subtitles.original: 嘘も真もない世界
subtitles.english: A world with neither lies nor truth

subtitles.original: ゆきましょう 極楽浄土
subtitles.english: Let's go to the Sukhavati

subtitles.original: 歌えや歌え 心のままに
subtitles.english: Sing and sing, just as your heart desires

subtitles.original: アナタの声を聞かせて
subtitles.english: Let me hear your voice

subtitles.original: 踊れや踊れ 時を忘れ
subtitles.english: Dance and dance, forgetting about time

subtitles.original: 今宵共にああ狂い咲き
subtitles.english: Tonight, together, ah, blooming madly

subtitles.original: 今宵アナタと狂い咲き
subtitles.english: Tonight, blooming madly with you
